name: Tabletop Tap
description: Business website for the Tabletop Tap taproom in Englewood, CO.

name: Budget Buddy
description: An app for researching and tracking prices of local restaurants.

name: Weather App
description: Allows user to search a 3rd-party weather API for data and also retreive their previous search results.

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors - GO!
description: A simple front-end Rock, Paper, Scissors game played against the computer.
